code:
flowchart TD
subgraph sanet virtual environment
A[sanetd]
B[poller]
H((entables))
I{{sanet wsgi}}
end
C[pingerd]
D[(redis)]
E[(postgres)]
F[apache2]
G[rrdcached]

A -- starts and monitor --> B & H & C
F -- start and send HTTP requests --> I
I -- retrives information --> E
A --stores data --> E
A -- cache and task queue --> D
B --> D
B -- send icmp packets--> C
A --stores timelines --> G
repo_description: elaborato di tesi magistrale sul software lifecicle management di applicativi per il monitoraggio
